values.text: $350
REFERRAL
BONUS
COMPANY NAME
Hi everyone,

As you already know, we’re always looking to add to our team of highly qualified writers and editors here at Clementine Press. We’re currently hiring for the Food Columnist role that would report to our Food Editor, Amy Clark. This is a full-time, salaried position. If you know someone who’d be a good fit for the role and our company, let us know.

 

If we hire the candidate you referred and they remain at our company for six months, you’ll earn a $350 bonus! We only ask that they not be previous employees here.

 

Have them apply to the job on our careers page—we’ll keep an eye out for them! If you have any questions regarding the process, don’t hesitate to ask.

Sincerely,

 

HR, Unlayer LLC

Unlayer LLC, HR Manager,

388 Market St, Suite 1300,

San Francisco, CA 94111
©️ All rights reserved Unlayer LLC.
